DeadbandDescription: Range under the load temperature where the curve won't change, unless the temperature is trending up.
HysteresisDescription: Minimum temperature delta for a change to occur.
HysteresisDownOnly: Hysteresis only applies on the way down
IgnoreHysteresis: Ignore hysteresis at minimum and maximum temps
OffsetDescription: Offset in % to be applied to the selected control
OffsetTemperatureDescription: Offset in degrees or percent (proportional) to be applied.
ProportionalOffsetDescription: Offset should be multiplied proportionally instead of added
ResponseTimeDescription: Minimum time before a change can occur.
StepDescription: Rate at which the value will change after the given response time. Step is half on the way down.
TimeDescription: Averaging period of the selected temperature source.
TwiceOnTheWayDown: Time is twice on the way down.
